title: Create the pop-up information with inline css styling

markdown.headingText: Create the pop-up information with inline css styling
markdown.markdown:
```{r meta, include=FALSE} library(metathis) meta() %>% meta_general( description = "An interactive map showing restaurants participating in Philadelphia's CCD Sips 2019", generator = "quarto" ) %>% meta_name("github-repo" = "spcanelon/silvia") %>% # https://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/metathis/reference/meta_viewport.html meta_viewport(width = "device-width", initial_scale = "1.0", maximum_scale = "1.0", user_scalable = "no") %>% # tags for social media meta_social( title = "Philly CCD Sips 2019 Interactive Map", url = "https://www.silviacanelon.com/blog/2019-ccd-sips/map.html", image = "https://github.com/spcanelon/silvia/blob/main/content/blog/2019-08-04-ccd-sips/featured.png?raw=true", image_alt = "Map of Philly's Center City with a pop-up saying Center City District Sips 2019", og_type = "website", og_author = "Silvia CanelÃ³n", twitter_card_type = "summary_large_image", twitter_creator = "@spcanelon" ) %>% # https://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/metathis/index.html # https://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/metathis/reference/write_meta.html write_meta(path = "meta-map.html") ``` ```{r include=FALSE} xfun::pkg_attach("tidyverse", "here", "leaflet") knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE) ``` ```{r} sips <- read_rds(here("blog/2019-08-04-ccd-sips/sips.Rds")) ``` ```{r} popInfoCircles<-paste("

", sips$Restaurant, "

", sips$Address, "

") popInfoMarker<-paste("

", "Center City District Sips 2019", "

", "Philadelphia, PA", "
") # Creating the map leaflet(data = sips, width = "100%", height = "850px") %>% addCircles( lat = ~ sips$Latitude, lng = ~ sips$Longitude, color = "olivedrab", fillOpacity=0.6, radius=8, popup = popInfoCircles, label = ~ Restaurant, labelOptions = labelOptions( style = list("font-family" = "Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif", "font-size" = "1.2em") )) %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% setView(mean(sips$Longitude), mean(sips$Latitude), zoom=17) %>% addMarkers( lng = mean(sips$Longitude), lat = mean(sips$Latitude), popup = popInfoMarker, label = "Center City District Sips 2019", labelOptions = labelOptions( style = list("font-family" = "Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif", "font-size" = "1.2em") )) %>% leaflet.extras::addFullscreenControl() ```
